key.name: showzeropower
key.description: Show a 0.0W power value instead of hiding it.

key.name: enabledebuglogs
key.summary: Enable debug logs in Gnome Shell log output
key.description: Enables debug logs for PowerTracker. The logs are output in the normal Gnome Shell log stream. On Ubuntu these logs can be looked at using the command 'journalctl --user-unit org.gnome.Shell@wayland.service -f'.
